thread.title: Oil price dips as Trump says current levels "won't be accepted"

title: Oil price dips as Trump says current levels "won't be accepted"
text:
Oil price dips as Trump says current levels "won't be accepted" 5:35pm BST - 01:59 
U.S. President Donald Trump criticized OPEC on Friday for output curbs that have helped raise global oil prices and said ''artificially'' high prices would not be accepted, drawing rebukes from oil-producing countries as prices dipped following his remarks. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump criticized OPEC on Friday for output curbs that have helped raise global oil prices and said "artificially" high prices would not be accepted, drawing rebukes from oil-producing countries as prices dipped following his remarks.
